title: When are these promised Yasuo nerfs I keep hearing about?
body: He's getting way out of hand, all he needs is a few kills to start completely demolishing teams. I have never wished the removal of any champion before except this ones.

replies.body:
Next patch, he loses some base damage on E but gets an AD scaling on it

kek

> [{quoted}](name=Penns,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zXw7oEGM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-17T04:39:45.681+0000)
>
> Next patch, he loses some base damage on E but gets an AD scaling on it
> 
> kek

An AD scaling that doesnt do too much*
That's nice and all but that doesn't address his balance issue at all.
he is balanced so stop crying already

He is balanced and in a fine state right now. 
His winrate ranking goes from 13th in bronze, at under 50%, to 84th in diamond, at just over 50%. His KDR is globally awful.
